    public class Section
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.FlowPanel
    This simple Widget represents a section. A section is a widget that displays a short text in a single line. The text is supposed to be a caption that explains the content below.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
